alert.note: Alert for Cooke; Denton; Montague; Wise (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 21 at 11:00PM CST until February 22 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Montague County in north central Texas... Northeastern Wise County in north central Texas... Northern Denton County in north central Texas... Southern Cooke County in north central Texas... * Until midnight CST. * At 1059 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northeast of Decatur, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Denton, Gainesville, Sanger, Decatur, Krum, Pilot Point, Aubrey, Ray Roberts Park Isle Du Bois, Lake Kiowa, Ray Roberts Park Johnson Branch and Valley View. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 472 and 494. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
